backend/main.mo: Backend canister defining user profiles, trades, mistakes, subscriptions, payments, admin auth, and QR code upload/view logic with authorization mixins and multiple data maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides 1–2 sentence summaries for numerous frontend files including tabs, components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global OKLCH-based light/dark theme variables and Tailwind base styles for consistent theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with early theme initialization using localStorage and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/domain-slug.txt: Contains the domain slug string for the frontend deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, entitlement-based tab visibility, backend connection states, and overall UI layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Modal dialog for entering the admin password to unlock admin access with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDisco: Dialog component for listing, creating, editing, enabling/disabling, and deleting discount codes using admin query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Main admin dashboard providing navigation to user management and dialogs for payments, payment methods, discounts, QR codes, and password rotation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPayme: Dialog for admins to create, edit, enable/disable, and delete payment methods with form handling and query hooks.
Dialog for uploading, previewing, replacing, and deleting the payment QR code with file validation and upload progress tracking.
Dialog showing pending payments where admins can view proofs, approve or reject payments, and activate subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRotat: Dialog for permanent admins to validate and update the admin unlock password with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: Admin panel dialog showing user details, subscription status, and actions to activate, cancel, or remove a user.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session handling and UI state indicators.
frontend/src/components/journal/EditTrad: Dialog for editing or deleting a trade entry with form inputs and confirmation for deletion.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalA: Displays summary analytics such as total trades, accuracy, and total P/L with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/journal/ProfitCa: Renders a monthly calendar showing daily net P/L and trade counts with navigation and date selection.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeEnt: Form component for creating a new trade entry, handling input state, validation, and submission via createTrade.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeLis: Displays a list of trades with formatting, profit/loss calculation, and edit actions, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/EditMis: Dialog for editing or deleting an existing mistake entry with mutation handlers and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/Mistake: Form component for logging a new trading mistake with date, category, and description inputs using createMistake.
Renders a list of mistake entries with category labels, AI suggestions, edit functionality, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Profile setup dialog that collects full name and username and submits them to create a new user profile.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Pa: UI for submitting a subscription payment with coupon handling, PDF upload validation, and payment submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Su: Displays current subscription status and available plans, allowing plan selection and routing to PaymentView.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Enhanced actor initializer with connection status tracking, health checks, and exponential auto-retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntitlement.ts: Derives feature access and plan metadata based on the caller’s subscription state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and initialization of stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on trades and mistakes using the backend actor with success/error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and DOM updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color variables for light/dark themes, plus utility and mobile dialog tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/backendConnectionErrors: Classifies backend connection errors and returns user-friendly messages with diagnostics.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Collects and formats backend environment diagnostics such as canister ID, host, and user agent.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports app branding constants like name, tagline, and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/domainSlug.ts: Validates and generates sanitized domain slugs and exports the app's predefined slug.
frontend/src/lib/pipValues.ts: Stores pip values for common forex pairs and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/lib/riskCalculator.ts: Provides pip value lookup and a lot-size calculator with validation.
frontend/src/lib/safeErrorMessage.ts: Converts raw errors into safer, user-friendly messages with special handling for payments, permissions, and uploads.
frontend/src/lib/trades.ts: Contains helpers to calculate P/L and format trade-related currency values.
frontend/src/lib/tradingPairs.ts: Defines selectable trading pair options for general use and calculators, including custom and metal pairs.
frontend/src/lib/userId.ts: Formats and parses sequential numeric user IDs for display and input.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/tabs/AdminPanelTab.tsx: Displays the admin panel or an access dialog based on permanent or unlocked admin authorization, handling related loading states.
frontend/src/tabs/JournalTab.tsx: Displays journal analytics, trade entry, trade list, and a calendar view with date-filtered trades.
frontend/src/tabs/MistakesTab.tsx: Fetches and displays user trading mistakes with an entry form and AI-suggestion notice.
frontend/src/tabs/ProfileTab.tsx: Loads and edits user profile data, handles admin checks, theme selection, and subscription view switching.
frontend/src/tabs/RiskCalculatorTab.tsx: Provides a risk management calculator for lot size based on account settings and pip values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project features, requirements, and current state for theme toggle implementation.
